USA: Vicente Yáñez Pinzón was named commander-in-chief and corregidor of the city of Puerto Rico, now called "San Juan". However, he did not fulfill this commission.
Tanzania: Captain John Homere, part of Francisco de Almeida's fleet, captures the archipelago of Zanzibar, making it part of the Portuguese Empire.
Russia: Ivan died. He was succeeded as Grand Duke of Muscovy by his son, Vasili III.
Poland: Signing of act of Nihil novi
Kenya: Portugal begin rule presence in Mombasa
China: The Hongzhi Emperor's son the Zhengde Emperor became emperor of the Ming dynasty.
Cambodia: The royal Khmer court moves to Oudong.
